item.description:
Let's have a movie night at home. We will be showing Mama Mia, for those who missed it, and for those who would like to see it again (and again and again....).

Bring popcorn, candy, soda (or wine), etc. Make it light and easy. This is a chance to get together and talk about how we made it thru the holidays (sigh), and enjoy a fun flick.

By now we will need a low key, stress free, inexpensive night out. So come on down to Pat's place and enjoy getting together once again.

This is a joint meetup with Spice of Life too Short
item.name: Movie Night - Mama Mia and Socializing (at Member's House)
